original_title: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells sets for Gym Exercise (Proudly Made in India) (5 kg set of 2 (blue), Blue)
optimized_title: KAKSS Neoprene Dumbbells Set, 5kg Pair (2 x 5kg) Blue Hex Dumbbells 5kg with Non-Slip Coated Grip, Washable Hand Weights Set Gym Weights for Home Gym Equipment and Exercise

image_analysis.product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells sets for Gym Exercise (Proudly Made in India) (5 kg set of 2 (blue), Blue)
key_features: Able to be washed without damage
image_analysis.usage: Strength training and exercise workouts at home or in the gym
image_analysis.target_audience: People looking for 5 kg dumbbells for home or gym workouts, including fitness enthusiasts and beginners
image_analysis.ai_description: A pair of blue hexagonal dumbbells with a textured, non-slip neoprene coating. Each end is clearly printed in white with the brand name “KAKSS” and “5 KG”. The dumbbells have a compact, solid shape and are shown in clean studio shots and gym lifestyle scenes.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Thick neoprene coating gives a secure, non-slip grip even with sweaty hands.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Cheap vinyl dumbbells get slippery and hard to hold during longer workouts.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Hexagonal design stops the KAKSS dumbbells rolling, safer for home floors.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Round budget dumbbells roll away, causing annoyance and trip hazards.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Washable neoprene surface stays hygienic for shared home and studio use.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Low-cost rubber or foam coatings crack or peel when wiped or washed.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Clearly printed 5 KG and branding make weight ID quick in busy workouts.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Cheap weights often have faded or missing markings, causing confusion.
